page.title: 17INDUSTRY IN NEWBOLD
page.content: Fifty years ago there were several small{factories}for making concrete drains, clay drainage pipes and refactory bricks as well as a coal mine. Today sixty five people work in{three {small factories.}There is a small factory employing ten men for making builders water proofing materials.It is called Seal Strip. Newbold Refactories employs twenty people and they make{refactory cement. This is used in blast furnaces. Adcliffe Engieering employs thirty five people and it makes{lorry motor {bodies.
